name: realities-app
description: An app for tribal decentralised organisations.

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm start --prefix api" "./scripts/wait.sh 3100 && npm start --prefix ui"
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix api && npm install --prefix ui
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix api && npm run build --prefix ui
scripts.test:run:neo: sudo docker rm -f neo-realities-test ; sudo docker run --name neo-realities-test --env=NEO4J_AUTH=none --publish=7574:7474 --publish=7787:7687 neo4j:4.2.1
scripts.test:run:mongo: sudo docker rm -f mongo-realities-test ; sudo docker run --name mongo-realities-test --publish=28017:27017 mongo:4.4.3
scripts.test:run:deps: sudo concurrently "npm run test:run:neo" "npm run test:run:mongo"
scripts.test:run:app: concurrently --kill-others "NODE_ENV=test npm start --prefix api" "./scripts/wait.sh 3101 && npm run start:test --prefix ui"
scripts.test:run:servers: sudo pwd && concurrently "npm run test:run:deps" "npm run test:run:app"
